amendment.description: To authorize the provision of post-traumatic stress disorder training to military and security forces of the Government of Ukraine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1703 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1703 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1703 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1703 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1463.
